+def create_instance(mcs=None, cls=None, filename=None):
+    """
+    This function creates an instance of a class.
+
+    Args:
+        mcs (object): The meta class.
+        cls (class): The class to instantiate.
+        filename (str): The name of the file.
+
+    Returns:
+        object: An instance of the class.
+    """
